UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Novel Antimicrobial Peptides from a Cecropin-Like Region of Heteroscorpine-1 from Heterometrus laoticus Venom with Membrane Disruption Activity.
Literature.Author: Erviana R, Saengkun Y, Rungsa P, Jangpromma N, Tippayawat P, Klaynongsruang S, Daduang J, Daduang S

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:0% Hemolysis=200 µg/ml,Human keratinocytes HaCat:25% Killing=150 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 27736(MIC=32µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 27736(MBC=128µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=8µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MBC=8µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis TISTR 008(MIC=8µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis TISTR 008(MBC=16µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=16µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MBC=64µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=16µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MBC=32µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae(MIC=32µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae(MBC=>128µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=128µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus(MBC=>128µg/ml),Murine macrophage cells RAW 264.7(60-70% Killing=150µg/ml)
